english.segment1: Lost for words with all to say. Lord you take my breath away. Still my soul, my soul cries out. For you are holy
english.segment2: And as I look upon your name. Circumstances fade away. Now your glory steals my heart
english.segment3: You are holy. You are holy Lord
english.segment4: Evermore my heart, my heart will say. Above all, I live for your glory. Even if my world falls I will say. Above all, I live for your glory
english.segment5: With all my heart I'll say. I'm living for your name. With all to give you praise. We're living for your glory Lord
english.segment6: Evermore my heart, my heart will say. Above all, I live for your glory. Even if my world falls I will say. Above all, I live for your glory
